div.p: NARRATOR: State-dependent learning can also be a part of the spiral.
NARRATOR: State dependent learning locks up things that I learn when making high-risk choices so that I am not able to remember them or do them well when I am sober.
NARRATOR: In the yellow phase, state dependent learning begins to "lock up" social skills.
NARRATOR: By the orange phase, this is extensive enough to become a major influence on drinking or drug choices,
because many of the things I want to do can be done best or most comfortably only when making high-risk choices.
